description: A shell script that automates the creation and seeding of a healthcare database schema using CLI commands. It handles database creation, table definitions, and initial data insertion in an idempotent manner.

methods.name: run_sql
methods.description: A function that executes SQL commands via the CLI command read from db_connection.txt.

calls: run_sql "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ..."
run_sql "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS doctors ..."
run_sql "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patients ..."
run_sql "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS doctor_schedules ..."
run_sql "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appointments ..."
echo "Schema and seed data applied successfully."
